name: Gimme The Tree
description:
Gimme The Tree is a survival, funny game.  Its story takes place in the future, where few trees are remaining. Business people seem not to care about this... So Jack decided to rebel. He was a lumberjack once... But one day he changed his mind. He started to feel the love of trees, and their importance. So his role is to smash tose business guys who want to take the trees.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Space - Shoot projectile
Left Ctrl - Lightray
